biography: Liv is the watchful guardian of Katje's complex IT systems, using AI to predict and prevent problems before they happen. As an AIOps Specialist, she applies machine learning to IT operations, automating tasks, detecting anomalies, and ensuring that everything runs smoothly. She is calm, observant, and methodical, finding a quiet satisfaction in building self-healing, intelligent systems.
